definitions: a thing that radiates or emits light, heat, or sound

examples.text: a dipole is a less efficient radiator of sound than a monopole

shortDefinitions: thing that radiates or emits light or sound

definitions: a device for heating a room consisting of a metal tank connected by pipes through which hot water is pumped by a central heating system.
shortDefinitions: device for heating room consisting of metal tank connected by pipes through which hot water is pumped by central heating system

definitions: a portable heater resembling a radiator.
shortDefinitions: portable oil or electric heater resembling such device

definitions: an engine-cooling device in a motor vehicle or aircraft consisting of a bank of thin tubes in which circulating fluid is cooled by the surrounding air

examples.text: the water in my car radiator froze

shortDefinitions: engine-cooling device in motor vehicle or aircraft consisting of bank of thin tubes in which circulating water is cooled by surrounding air
